name: AdWired
tag_list: mobile, iphone, android, ad, advertisement, media, rich-media, windows-phone, blackberry, nokia, bada, symbian, html5
overview:
AdWired is a mobile ads media network that works on every mobile platform.

AdWired mobile media networks lets you find and engage the most receptive audience: smartphone and tablet users. Unique targeting features together with interactive banners lets you to reach highest ROI.

Let your apps earn money for you right now! Join AdWired network and show rich media banners to your customers. Leave sales to us or sale ads to your own advertisers.

It takes only one hour to integrate AdWired to your app. SDK is available for all mobile platforms: iOS, Android, Windows Phone 7, Bada, Symbian, Blackberry. Full HTML5 support allows you to create fully interactive banners with audio and video clips.

Using AdWired SDK you can not only deliver ads but also collect detailed app usage stats. You can setup any targeting you want based on that data.
